summary.para: Gets an interface object, as specified.

param.name: flags
param.para: The GPS_XXX flags that modify the store that is returned. See .

param.name: dwStoreId
param.para: The property store ID. Valid values are.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the desired IID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: The address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method to create a specified object in circumstances where property access is potentially slow.
